PRODUCTREVIEW_SEARCH_WHERE.Statement: WHERE w2_ProductReview.shop_id = @shop_id AND w2_ProductReview.product_id = @product_id AND w2_ProductReview.open_flg = '1'

PRODUCTREVIEW_SEARCH_ORDER_BY.Statement: ORDER BY w2_ProductReview.date_created DESC, -- 常に一定の結果セットを得るため、主キー（昇順）ソート w2_ProductReview.shop_id ASC, w2_ProductReview.product_id ASC, w2_ProductReview.review_no ASC
